content.description: Image © The Metropolitan Museum of Art / Image Source © Art Resource, NY
content.question: Which of the work’s elements contributes most to the illusion of spatial depth in the image?

choices.label: The top of the wave, because of its placement at the top of the composition
The mountain, because of its small size in relation to the other objects
The blue color, because of its contrast with the other, more neutral colors
The fishing boats, because of the way they echo the shape of the wave

content.answer: The mountain, because of its small size in relation to the other objects

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
